name: Shrek: Swamp Kart Speedway
description: Grab your bravest friends and race through fairylands you didn't even know existed. You've never seen your favorite ogre move this fast before! 8 playable characters each in their own special freak-kart, 4 bad bosses to defeat, unlock and play, 16 swampy race tracks, Multiplayer action allows friends to race each other.
